name: A-Z
descr: The first serious project. A small text puzzle game based on the alphabet. Written on Kotlin. The Volley library was used to make HTTP requests to the web leaderboard.

name: Camo Tracker
descr: Camo Tracker for Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War. Built with React, Redux, Router Dom. Design is adapted for desktop and mobile devices. Progress is saved by storing state in localStorage. In the future I plan to add authentication and progress storage on the server (Node.JS, MongoDB).
